gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate
Class TransientEntitiesReattacher<P extends PersistentObject<?>>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate.TransientEntitiesReattacher<P>
Type Parameters:
P - Type of PersistentObject
Deprecated. There is now a unified re-attacching mechanism for both transient and detached instances. 

@Deprecated
public abstract class TransientEntitiesReattacher<P extends PersistentObject<?>>
extends Object

A TransientEntitiesReattacher is responsible for re-attaching managed entities that are found in the graph of a transient object. This may happen for instance when a managed entity is added in a transient's entities graph in a many-to-one node.
Invoking for a non-transient instance is a no-op.

Constructor Summary
TransientEntitiesReattacher()
          Deprecated.  
 
Method Summary
protected abstract  Set<PersistentObject<?>> findEntitiesToReattach(P po)
          Deprecated. A concrete implementation of this method is responsible for providing a Set of PersistentObjects found in the po's graph that may be, in fact, managed by Hibernate.
 void reattach(P po, Provider provider)
          Deprecated. Re-attaches to the current Hibernate Session any PersistentObjects found in po's graph that may be managed by Hibernate.

Re-attaches to the current Hibernate Session any PersistentObjects found in po's graph that may be managed by Hibernate.

findEntitiesToReattach

protected abstract Set<PersistentObject<?>> findEntitiesToReattach(P po)
Deprecated. 
A concrete implementation of this method is responsible for providing a Set of PersistentObjects found in the po's graph that may be, in fact, managed by Hibernate.

Parameters:
po - PersistentObject whose object graph is searched.
Returns:
A Set of entities that might be managed and need to be re-attached.
